item.title: Coding Confessions
item.description: CW21 Hack Day - 2021-03-31 to 2021-04-01 Blanch-1943 - HP3-CW21 Hack Day idea proposer Colin Sauze Idea name (provisional) Coding Confessions Context and/or research domain Anybody who writes code for research Hack Day Demo Problem People don’t want to talk about their mistakes, publish code or submit it for review. Only positive results get published. Common reasons for this are fear that “my code isn’t good enough”, “isn’t complete enough”, “has mistakes in it”.
